cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause security configuration failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PRACH configuration index to 200 is invalid for the frequency band, causing configuration validation failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PRACH 配置索引設定為 200 對於頻率頻段無效，導致配置驗證失敗。
